text.description: with nine towers of lavish accommodations built along the breathtaking bluffs of the Ameca River, Grand Luxxe at Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta is a paragon of luxury living.

0.title: Where To Stay
0.name: rooms
0.flavor_text: From beautiful rooms to posh lofts and sweeping suites, Grand Luxxe at Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta offers a wide range of high-end accommodations.

1.title: Where To Swim
1.name: pools
1.flavor_text: Swim in a rooftop oasis, luxuriate in a Jacuzzi overlooking the Bay of Banderas, or kick back next to a trio of pristine pools.

text.title: Fine Dining
text.flavor: Choose from an array of gourmet restaurants helmed by some of the world’s best chefs.

text.title: Bars and Lounges
text.flavor: From elegant lounges to lively bars with live music, find the right setting for your evening.

text.title: In-Room Dining
text.flavor: Eat like royalty from the comfort of your own room thanks to our extensive room service menu.

text.title: Casual Dining
text.flavor: Mexican, American, international—find the cuisine you crave from our wide selection of eateries.

0.name: dining-intro
0.flavor_text: With over 40 restaurants and lounges to choose from, Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta gives guests the opportunity to dine however they like. Options range from high-end eateries to casual restaurants to authentic Mexican spots, and even a gourmet market filled with offerings from all over the world. One thing is for sure—an amazing culinary experience is always just a meal away at Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta.

1.title: Must-Taste Dish
1.name: featured-restaurant
1.flavor_text: Delight in the flavors of authentic Mexico with this Puebla-born dish, made with spit-roasted pork marinated with pineapple.

text.description: Browse our selection of fine dining options at Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta.

text.title: Azur
text.flavor: Authentic fine French cuisine in a modern setting

text.title: Costa Arena
text.flavor: The fresh, ingredient-driven dishes of Californian cuisine with a gorgeous ocean view

text.title: Epazote
text.flavor: The best of Mexican cuisine, elevated to stun the palate

text.title: Gong
text.flavor: A tour of Asia’s brightest flavors and favorite dishes

text.title: Quinto Charcoal Grill
text.flavor: This rooftop eatery offers premium cuts, smoky flavors, and stunning views

text.title: The Burger Custom Made
text.flavor: Gourmet burgers with a sophisticated twist

text.title: Tramonto
text.flavor: Choose from an array of gourmet restaurants helmed by some of the world’s best chefs.

text.description: Browse our selection of fine dining options at Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta.

0.title: Featured Dish
0.name: escargot
0.flavor_text: This celebrated French appetizer is served with garlic butter and parsley.

1.title: Location & Hours
1.name: hours
1.flavor_text: At La Plaza, 3rd Floor Monday – Sunday 7 AM – 11 PM

text.description: Costa Arena offers a wide variety of seafood dishes—prepared in a simple California-cuisine style—served in a breathtaking setting just above the sands bordering Banderas Bay. Dishes are made with the freshest shrimp, scallops, lobster, mussels, fish, crab cakes, and soft-shell crab—served buttered, marinated, seared, stuffed, grilled, breaded, or sautéed.

0.title: Featured Dish
0.name: spicy-tuna-tartare
0.flavor_text: Enjoy fresh seafood, including tuna tartare with soy sauce, ginger, and roasted chili pepper-soy sauce..

1.title: Location & Hours
1.name: hours
1.flavor_text: By the Grand Luxxe Punta Pool Monday – Sunday 11 AM – 11 PM Chef: Issac Hernandez

text.description: At Epazote, Mexican favorites get a modern refresh while maintaining their traditional flavor profiles. Menu options include inspired renditions of cochinita pibil, chiles rellenos, mole, tamales, enchiladas, burritos, and gorditas. Don’t miss the all-new Tasting Menu, complete with a thoughtful wine pairing option.
text.header: A Modern Take on Mexican Cuisine

0.title: Featured Dish
0.name: mixiote-lamb
0.flavor_text: This traditional Mexican specialty of lamb stew is slow cooked with maguey leaves for a rich, deep flavor.

1.title: Location & Hours
1.name: hours
1.flavor_text: In Grand Luxxe Tower 1, Ground Floor Monday – Sunday 5:30 PM – 11 PM Chef: Axel Jimenez Lira

text.description: Transport yourself to the East and take a tour of the culinary traditions and delicacies of Asia with the flavors of a meal at Gong. Favorites include Peking Duck, lobster rolls, tempura ice cream, and dessert sushi. Or try the teppanyaki dinner, where you can watch your multiple-course dinner prepared on a grill right before you!

0.title: Featured Dish
0.name: sashimi-gong
0.flavor_text: This warm salmon sashimi comes complete with ginger and garlic, seared with olive oil, and a citrus soy sauce.

1.title: Location & Hours
1.name: hours
1.flavor_text: By the Grand Mayan Monday – Sunday 5:30 PM – 11 PM Chef: Mitzuo Takahashi

text.description: Situated in the Sky Lounge at the very top of Grand Luxxe’s new Tower 5, Quinto offers guests fine dining service set within a relaxed yet luxurious atmosphere, with breathtaking views of Banderas Bay, the Ameca River, and the Sierra Madre Mountains.
text.header: The Best of Land and Sea

0.title: Featured Dish
0.name: rib-eye-cap
0.flavor_text: Any steak aficionado knows the tenderloin is the most tender cut, and the rib eye is the most flavorful. Welcome to the best of both worlds. The rib eye cap is flash-cooked on our charcoal grill to buttery, umami perfection—this is one steak you’ll surely want to savor.

1.title: Location & Hours
1.name: hours
1.flavor_text: Sky Lounge at Grand Luxxe Tower 5 Monday – Sunday 11 AM – 11 PM Chef: David Vidales

text.description: At this al fresco restaurant, the quintessential American classic—the burger—gets a bold reinterpretation. Try elevated iterations, including Kobe beef with foie gras, angus beef and lobster, duck and gorgonzola, Mediterranean lamb, Asian salmon, and more. And don’t miss mouthwatering sides like the Parmesan truffle fries!

0.title: Featured Dish
0.name: pepper-burger
0.flavor_text: Try a deluxe take on the classic burger with peppercorn sauce, brie cheese, and onion confit.

1.title: Location & Hours
1.name: hours
1.flavor_text: Sky Lounge at Grand Luxxe Tower 5 Monday – Sunday 5:30 PM – 11 PM Chef: David Vidales

text.description: This luxurious restaurant offers Italian cuisine and steaks that are sure to delight the most discerning palate, served in a sophisticated setting. Pair a house-made pasta or risotto, or Tramonto’s specialty, prime rib, with a selection from the extensive international wine list.

0.title: Featured Dish
0.name: ossobuco
0.flavor_text: Take a trip to authentic Italy with this succulent dish consisting of veal shank braised in red wine with vegetables.

1.name: tramonto-hours
1.flavor_text: Take a trip to authentic Italy with this succulent dish consisting of veal shank braised in red wine with vegetables.

text.flavor: From wraps and sandwiches to small dishes, delight in fresh food served poolside

text.title: Il forno di Gio

text.flavor: Celebrate your visit to Mexico with authentic cuisine and fresh margaritas

text.title: Mercado Mexico`
text.flavor: Dine on Mexican street food, or antojitos, at La Plaza

text.title: Ola Mulata
text.flavor: Classic savory dishes, like quesadillas and burgers, or the famously fresh Catch of the Day

text.title: Rummba
text.flavor: A wide variety of delicious casual dishes, including American favorites

text.title: Samba

text.title: Si Snack
text.flavor: From drinks to appetizers, get everything you need to refuel after a day by the pool

text.flavor: A wide selection of sweet and savory crêpes in a café environment

text.title: Sky Garden
text.flavor: Fresh dishes served in a heavenly rooftop lounge and pool setting

text.flavor: Traditional Mexican cuisine, including tacos, quesadillas, volcanes, and tortas

0.title: Location & Hours
0.name: hours
0.flavor_text: By Sea Garden Monday – Sunday 11 AM – 7 PM Chef: Karla Colin Valkerplaken

text.description: The Ameca Social House is Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta’s 19th hole restaurant. With a sleek, stylish dining room and a gorgeous patio that offers panoramic views, the Ameca Social House is a favorite dining destination for guests. Dishes vary from classic American to posh takes on pub fare, and the extensive whiskey menu is not to be missed.
text.header: Elevated Pub Fare on the Green

0.title: Featured Dish
0.name: the-tomahawk
0.flavor_text: An impressive French-trimmed bone-in rib eye steak cooked to perfection and paired with garlic mashed potatoes and grilled vegetables.

1.title: Location & Hours
1.name: hours
1.flavor_text: At Grand Luxxe Residence Tower Monday – Sunday 6 AM – 10 PM Chef: Hector Illan

text.description: Balance Snack Bar is the perfect place to recharge after a day of sun-soaked lounging. Balance offers a variety of healthy and delicious food and drinks. Choose from a robust menu of sandwiches, baguettes, salads, juices, or smoothies, or indulge in a creamy gelato.
text.header: A Healthy Approach to Casual Cuisine

1.title: Location & Hours
1.name: hours
1.flavor_text: In The Grand Mayan by Brio Monday – Sunday 7:15 AM – 10:45 PM Chef: Hector Illan

text.description: Offering a wide variety of sandwiches, burgers, and refreshing cocktails, Balché is ideal for guests spending their day under the sun. This restaurant was named after the ancient Mayans’ sacred drink, “balché.”

0.title: Featured Dish
0.name: octopus-tacos-al-pastor
0.flavor_text: Try a new and inspired twist on tacos with this dish featuring spicy octopus marinated in chili pepper.

1.title: Location & Hours
1.name: hours
1.flavor_text: At the Mayan Palace Pool Monday – Sunday 11 AM – 6 PM Chef: Laura Reynaga

text.description: Take in the charm of the Nayarit scenery and the tastes of paradise at this restaurant overlooking the lake at the center of Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta. Stop by for breakfast at an extensive buffet filled with fresh fruit, baked breads, and made-to-order omelettes. Or check out the restaurant in the evening for their famous themed dinner menus!

0.title: Featured Dish
0.name: northern-eggs
0.flavor_text: Don’t miss this famous dish of eggs scrambled with machaca and accompanied by refried beans, guacamole, salsa, and flour tortillas.

1.title: Location & Hours
1.name: hours
1.flavor_text: By La Plaza Monday – Sunday 7 AM – 12 PM Chef: Demetrio Rendón

text.description: You may be vacationing in Mexico, but that’s no reason your taste buds can’t take a trip to Spain! From the complex flavors of authentic paella to the rich and bright tastes of tapas, Chiringuito brings authentic Spanish food—and all of its vivid character—to your plate.

0.title: Featured Dish
0.name: paella-valenciana
0.flavor_text: This traditional Spanish rice dish is prepared with seafood, pork, and chicken, all seasoned with the distinctive flavor of saffron.

1.title: Location & Hours
1.name: hours
1.flavor_text: By The Grand Bliss Pool Monday – Sunday 11 AM – 11 PM Chef: Maximiliano Torres P.

text.description: Take in the beautiful view of the Ameca River and sample fresh, flavorful fare at this delightful snack and light meal spot by the Grand Luxxe Spa Tower Pools.

0.title: Featured Dish
0.name: crab-cake-pita
0.flavor_text: Keep it light with this sandwich made with pita bread, crab cake, remoulade sauce, and onion.

1.title: Location & Hours
1.name: hours
1.flavor_text: At Grand Luxxe Spa Tower Pools Monday – Sunday 7 AM – 5:30 PM Chef: Christian Jiménez

text.description: Havana Moon is the perfect place to delight in your tropical vacation setting while enjoying a dinner of flavorful dishes, like their famous jerk chicken. Or sip a sangria or tropical drink while you enjoy the expansive seaside views. They also offer live Caribbean music regularly and a spectacular fire show!

0.title: Featured Dish
0.name: jerk-chicken
0.flavor_text: This zesty dish features tender chicken rubbed with a kicky Jamaican spice mix.

1.title: Location & Hours
1.name: hours
1.flavor_text: By The Grand Bliss Pool Monday – Sunday 5:30 PM – 11 PM Chef: Idelfonso Navarrete

text.description: When the craving for pizza strikes, you can rely on Il Forno di Gio to satisfy! Based out of the Havana Moon kitchen, this pizza spot specializes in wood-fired pies which get their rich flavor from the special brick oven. Available for takeout or to go, ordered to your room.

0.title: Featured Dish
0.name: quattro-stagioni
0.flavor_text: A pie with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, mushrooms, artichokes, prosciutto, and black olives.

1.title: Location & Hours
1.name: hours
1.flavor_text: Based Out of the Havana Moon Kitchen Monday – Sunday 11 AM – 11 PM Chef: Chef: Rosalba Martínez

text.description: Enjoy the vibrant flavors of Mexico at this colorful and fun eatery modeled after the classic Mexican bar and comfort food restaurant. With playful and unique décor, an extensive selection of margaritas, a beautiful patio with a front-row seat for The Lake Show, air conditioning, and a menu loaded with authentic Mexican favorites, La Cantina offers a fiesta every night. Open for both lunch and dinner.

0.title: Featured Dish
0.name: los-chapulines
0.flavor_text: Traditional crispy grasshoppers with lime and chili powder, served with handmade corn tortillas and guacamole.

1.title: Location & Hours
1.name: hours
1.flavor_text: Next to The Grand Mayan Monday – Sunday 12 PM – 1 AM Chef: Julio Cahuich

text.description: For a taste of the sea, set your sights on the al fresco eatery Limón y Sal. Here you can find the best of the coast, including lobster tacos, seafood burritos, and a wide selection of ceviches made with fresh fish or shrimp and marinated in lime juice and spices.

0.title: Featured Dish
0.name: asian-ceviche
0.flavor_text: This ceviche stars fresh salmon seasoned with soy sauce, tamarind, ginger, sesame seeds, chili pepper, and lemongrass.

0.name: escargot

1.title: Location & Hours
1.name: hours
1.flavor_text: Sky Lounge at Grand Luxxe Tower 5 Monday – Sunday 11 AM – 11 PM Chef: David Vidales

text.description: Overlooking the Pacific Ocean, Ola Mulata is the perfect place for a leisurely late lunch or an early dinner. This al fresco restaurant offers American favorites like burgers, sandwiches, Philly cheese steaks, and ribs, or Mexican classics like shrimp tacos, chicken fajitas, and quesadillas. Or try the house specialty, the catch of the day, prepared on a traditional open-air grill.

0.title: Featured Dish
0.name: pescado-zarandeado
0.flavor_text: Savor the fresh tastes of the sea with this delicious snapper dish, cooked to order!

1.title: Location & Hours
1.name: hours
1.flavor_text: By The Grand Mayan Aqua Park Monday – Sunday 11 AM – 7 PM Chef: Gustavo Rojas

text.description: Guests at Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta can enjoy a delicious meal in a casual setting by visiting this restaurant by Sea Garden. Don’t miss their famous breakfast buffet, boasting every savory and sweet morning delight you could desire.

0.title: Featured Dish
0.name: mole-enchiladas
0.flavor_text: For a taste of Authentic Mexico, indulge in these decadent enchiladas drizzled in rich mole sauce.

1.title: Location & Hours
1.name: hours
1.flavor_text: By Sea Garden Monday – Sunday 7 AM – 11 PM Chef: Maribel Aguirre

text.description: For poolside dining that will please every taste, be sure to visit Samba. Known for their delicious breakfast buffet and international lunch and dinner menus, Samba has a wide range of flavorful options served in an open-air dining room.

0.title: Featured Dish
0.name: chicken-salad
0.flavor_text: A classic lunch staple made with lettuce, green asparagus, sunflower seeds, crispy beets, and herb-marinated chicken breast.

1.title: Location & Hours
1.name: hours
1.flavor_text: By The Grand Mayan Pool Monday – Sunday 7 PM – 11 PM Chef: Giovanni De la Paz

text.description: Score the quick and satisfying bite or delicious drink you’re looking for when relaxing by the Grand Luxxe Punta Pools with poolside service by Si Snack. Whether you’re craving salad, a sandwich, or small bites, Si Snack has you covered. And don’t miss out on Si Bar next door!

0.title: Featured Dish
0.name: mediterranean-tartine
0.flavor_text: This celebrated French appetizer is served with garlic butter and parsley.

1.title: Location & Hours
1.name: hours
1.flavor_text: At Grand Luxxe Punta Pools Monday – Sunday 12 PM – 6 PM Chef: Felipe Hernández

text.description: Sweet Paris is on a mission to revive the art of eating crêpes. With a menu of classic entrée and dessert crêpes, fresh paninis, soups, salads, and café drinks, Sweet Paris is your go-to destination for a taste of authentic Parisian street food. Take your crêpe outside to eat on the patio overlooking the lake in front of La Plaza.

0.title: Featured Dish
0.name: the-houstonian-crêpe
0.flavor_text: Rise and shine with bacon, sausage, potatoes, mozzarella, and scrambled eggs wrapped in a fresh hot crêpe.

1.title: Location & Hours
1.name: hours
1.flavor_text: 1st floor of La Plaza Monday – Sunday 7:15 AM – 10:45 PM Chef: Alberto Sierra

text.description: This Grand Luxxe Residence Tower-exclusive rooftop restaurant and lounge offers spectacular views along with fresh, delicious bites, and refreshing cocktails. With some of the best vistas on the resort, including views of the lush Ameca River and the Sierra Madres, this unique and luxurious spot also features a gorgeous pool and surrounding loungers and sunbeds.

0.title: Featured Dish
0.name: cobb-chicken-sandwich
0.flavor_text: This celebrated French appetizer is served with garlic butter and parsley.

1.title: Location & Hours
1.name: hours
1.flavor_text: The Roof of Grand Luxxe Residence Tower Monday – Sunday 11 AM – 6 PM Chef: Christian Jiménez

text.description: If you want to enjoy traditional Mexican cuisine—tacos, quesadillas, volcanes, tortas and “frijoles charros”—in a relaxed and al fresco setting, check out this great restaurant.

0.title: Featured Dish
0.name: tacos-al-pastor
0.flavor_text: Taste the authentic flavors of Mexico with this dish featuring pork that is marinated in dried chilies, spices, and pineapple, slow-roasted on a spit, and then shredded for you to enjoy in fresh tortillas.

1.title: Location & Hours
1.name: hours
1.flavor_text: Mercado México Monday – Sunday 1 PM – 10:45 PM Chef: Noe Neri Eugenio

text.title: The Grand Vista Bar

text.flavor: Located within Tramonto, choose from a selection of great wines and cocktails

text.title: Luxxe Bar
text.flavor: Boasting a huge selection of tequilas in an elegant, art-filled environment

text.title: The Grand Lobby Bar
text.flavor: The perfect place to take in live music and enjoy a post-dinner margarita

text.flavor: Specialty cocktails and classic drinks to sip while enjoying live entertainment

text.title: La Isla de Cocos
text.flavor: Stop by on your way to the beach and enjoy a fresh cocktail served in a coconut

text.description: Why choose between a refreshing drink and a relaxing swim? Take advantage of swim-up service at one of our Pool Bars, and enjoy vacation the way it’s meant to be.
text.header: Snack and Sip by the Water

0.title: Location & Hours
0.name: hours
0.flavor_text: Monday – Sunday 11 AM – 7 PM

text.description: There’s no better way to welcome the relaxation of vacation than with a celebratory tropical drink or ice-cold cerveza. This lobby bar located in Sea Garden offers a quiet place to luxuriate in your paradise surroundings.

0.title: Location & Hours
0.name: hours
0.flavor_text: Monday – Sunday 5 PM – 1 AM

text.description: After a day filled with adventure, relax with a cocktail on the gorgeous outdoor patio of the Grand Vista Bar in the lobby of The Grand Bliss. The extensive drink and spirit menu features a variety of options from all over the world; select whatever piques your interest and toast to trying something new!

0.title: Location & Hours
0.name: hours
0.flavor_text: Monday – Thursday 3 PM – 11 PM Friday – Sunday 11 AM to 11 PM

text.description: For a craft cocktail prepared in a chic and urbane setting, visit Library Bar, located in Tramonto restaurant in The Grand Mayan. This lounge is manned by a team of expert mixologists whose inspired flavors mingle beautifully in every drink they carefully create.

0.title: Location & Hours
0.name: hours
0.tagline: Inside Tramonto, Located in The Grand Mayan
0.flavor_text: Monday – Sunday 5:30 PM – 11 PM

0.title: Location & Hours
0.name: hours
0.tagline: In Grand Luxxe Tower 1, by Epazote
0.flavor_text: Monday – Thursday 5:30 PM – 1 AM Friday – Sunday 11:00 AM – 1 AM

text.description: Located in the lobby of The Grand Mayan, this bar comes to life nightly with live music. Kick back in one of its comfortable lounge areas and enjoy a brew or freshly prepared cocktail and soak up the sweet rhythms of vacation.

0.title: Location & Hours
0.name: hours
0.flavor_text: Monday – Thursday 3 PM – 11 PM Friday – Sunday 11 AM to 11 PM

text.description: There’s only one place at Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta where you can watch as an artist paints a portrait of the world with just sand, that thousands of years of Mexican history and tradition come to life through dance, that you’ll fall in love with the many sides—and personas—of a lovable clown, and you drink craft cocktails while listening to the hit-filled set of one of the area’s best DJs. That place is Santuario, the sweeping entertainment space seated at the center of Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta. Welcome to the life of the party, all under one thatched roof.
text.header: Lights, Camera, and Plenty of Action

0.name: santuario-day
0.flavor_text: At 7 AM, Santuario opens and guests can greet the day with strong coffee, fresh fruit smoothies, and yummy pastries on any of the lounges or terraces that fill the space. The structure is also the first place that greets most guests during their vacation, being the gateway to the parking area and taxi pick up and drop off.

1.name: santuario-night
1.flavor_text: Every night, Santuario boasts a different assortment of astounding acts, from traditional dance, to jazz, to singers, to acrobatics, and live art preparation. Guests can enjoy these performances on the main lounge, or relax with a drink prepared by Santuario’s expert mixologists on any of the many side lounges or terraces. And after the acts wrap up for the night, a DJ mixes live music until close. Acts change nightly, so see your concierge for a schedule of that evening’s performances.

2.name: text-out-of-bounds
2.tagline: Performer Profile: Oasis Brightens Your Nights
2.flavor_text: With its cool Cuban sounds and charismatic rhythms to get your whole body moving, Oasis is a favorite act at Santuario. This five-person band specializes in salsa music and other intoxicating beats of the Caribbean, and they’re known for getting their audiences up on their feet and dancing.

3.title: Featured Cocktail
3.name: cocktail
3.flavor_text: Embrace vacation with this zesty drink from Santuario, starring the smoky flavor of mezcal blended with citrus and ginger for a bit of a kick.

text.description: Whether you’re lounging poolside or beachside, indulge in vacation bliss with a tropical drink served in a coconut or a michelada.

0.title: Location & Hours
0.name: hours
0.tagline: Located in front of The Grand Bliss pool
0.flavor_text: Monday – Sunday 11 PM – 7 PM

text.description: Browse our selection of fine dining options at Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta.

text.title: Room Service
text.flavor: Your favorite dishes, including many from other resort restaurants, enjoyed in your room

text.title: Il forno di Gio
text.flavor: Fresh-baked wood-fired pizzas for take-out or delivery

0.title: Rooms & Suites
0.name: rooms
0.tagline: Grand Luxxe Three Bedroom Presidential Villa
0.flavor_text: This expansive villa features two gourmet kitchens, two living rooms, three bedrooms, three and a half bathrooms with three Jacuzzi tubs, and two private terraces with two plunge pools.

text.description: The Three Bedroom Presidential Villa features three bedrooms with two king-size beds and two double beds, three and a half baths with three Jacuzzi tubs, a private terrace with two plunge pools, two gourmet kitchens, two living rooms with sleeper sofas, two dining rooms, and five TVs.
text.header: Grand Luxxe Three Bedroom Presidential Villa

text.description: Surrounded by lush jungle and the Sierra Madre Mountains on one side and the Pacific on the other, The Nayar Course is a joy for every player, from your low to high handicap. But with seven lakes, 49 strategically placed bunkers, and constant, strong crosswinds coming off of the ocean, this course always presents a challenge.
text.header: The Nayar Course at Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta

text.description: Every day spent at Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta is an opportunity for guests of all ages to experience new things, explore the culture of Mexico, or just soak up the sun in paradise. The resort offers a wide variety of activities to try, as well as a variety of beautiful pools and water features to explore. Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta is also home to some of the best resort shopping in Mexico.

billboards.name: pools-billboard
billboards.title: Nuevo Vallarta
billboards.flavor_text: With a host of different pools, an Aqua Park, and a Lazy River, this resort is a paradise for those who love spending their vacation at the pool.

billboards.name: activities-billboard
billboards.title: Nuevo Vallarta
billboards.flavor_text: Find an array of ways to spend your days with the resort activities, including options for kids, adults, and the whole family.

billboards.name: shoppping-billboard
billboards.title: Nuevo Vallarta
billboards.flavor_text: At the center of Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta’s shopping experience is La Plaza, a three-story facility filled with specialty boutiques, food counters, a bazaar, and so much more.

text.description: When you vacation at Grand Luxxe Nuevo Vallarta, you get to experience some of the most beautiful pools in all of Mexico, including Grand Luxxe-exclusive pools, as well as all The Grand Bliss, The Grand Mayan, Mayan Palace, and Sea Garden pools.

text.title: Grand Luxxe Tower 1 Circular Pool
text.flavor: Surrounded by a beautiful lounge deck, this gorgeous round pool is located right next to Grand Luxxe Tower 1.

text.title: Grand Luxxe Tower 1 Infinity Pool
text.flavor: Boasting an infinity edge and Jacuzzis nestled into one side, this expansive pool, located directly adjacent to Tower 1 Pool 1 and by Blue Fish, has an activities stand and a lounge deck.

text.title: grand luxxe tower 1 circular pool
text.flavor: Located just off from the Mayan Palace Pool, this oval-shaped, adults-only pool overlooks the ocean.

text.title: Grand Luxxe Adults-Only Pool
text.flavor: This distinctive pool boasts a famous spiral shape and expansive lounging area while offering sweeping views of the Ameca River and Bay of Banderas. Featuring a horseshoe-shaped cluster of Jacuzzis, a swim-up bar, and food service by Si Snack.

text.title: Grand Luxxe Punta Pool West
text.flavor: This petite pool is located between a lovely lagoon and Punta Pool East, and boasts a large, beautiful lounge area. Featuring a swim-up bar and activities stand nearby.

text.title: Grand Luxxe Spa Tower Pools
text.flavor: This pool cluster includes several secluded coves and a surrounding lounge, where you can enjoy a beverage or bite from the adjacent restaurant, Fresh Co. Featuring an activities stand and swim-up bar.

text.title: Grand Luxxe Residence Sky Garden Pool
text.flavor: Located on top of the Grand Luxxe Residence building, this rectangular pool is surrounded by lounge beds. Guests can enjoy food and beverages from the Fresh Co Sky Garden restaurant.

text.title: Grand Luxxe Tower 5 Sky Lounge Pool
text.flavor: This brand-new rooftop pool is perched at the top of Grand Luxxe Tower 5. Located next to Quinto Charcoal Cuisine, this gorgeous pool features an infinity edge, so that its azure waters blend into the vibrant blue of the sky.

text.title: Grand Luxxe Kid’s Club Pool
text.flavor: Grand Luxxe guests can drop their children off at the Grand Luxxe-exclusive Kid’s Club, located just off from the Spa Tower Pool, by Grand Luxxe Tower 3 and 4. Here, they can enjoy some fun in the sun under the supervision of our wonderful Kid’s Club staff.

text.description: With two of the region’s premier courses—The Nayar Course and the Norman Signature Course—plus the brand-new 10 hole, par-3 The Lakes Course, a world-class golf academy, a beautiful new restaurant, and the longest golf cart suspension bridge in the world, there really is no vacation getaway for golfers that compares to Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta..

billboards.flavor_text: A natural and technical masterpiece, this 18-hole, par 70 course is forgiving to beginners, but is rimmed with seven lakes and 49 strategically placed bunkers that can challenge the most experienced golfers.

The brand-new, 18-hole Norman Signature Course boasts a beautiful and enjoyable layout, which can only be accessed by the Ameca Bridge. This course features wall-to-wall paspalum and challenging shots around the greens.

The newest addition to the golf offerings at Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta, this beautiful 10 hole, par-3 course showcases views of some of the resort’s most beloved landmarks while you play. It’s also the region’s only lit course, offering play until 11 PM.

text.description: Surrounded by lush jungle and the Sierra Madre Mountains on one side and the Pacific on the other, The Nayar Course is a joy for every player, from your low to high handicap. But with seven lakes, 49 strategically placed bunkers, and constant, strong crosswinds coming off of the ocean, this course always presents a challenge.
text.header: The Nayar Course at Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta

text.description: Surrounded by lush jungle and the Sierra Madre Mountains on one side and the Pacific on the other, The Nayar Course is a joy for every player, from your low to high handicap. But with seven lakes, 49 strategically placed bunkers, and constant, strong crosswinds coming off of the ocean, this course always presents a challenge.
text.header: The Nayar Course at Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta

text.description: Vacation is about restful and renewing relaxation. It’s about indulging in peace and taking a moment to enjoy the clarity of being removed from your busy home life. At Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta, we help you embrace that serenity and harness the revitalizing powers of paradise with two beautiful, well-appointed spas.

0.title: Brio
0.flavor_text: Open to all guests, Brio Spa is a sophisticated reimagining of the French approach to spas. Here you can luxuriate in an atmosphere of utter tranquility and unwind with lavish treatments formulated for relaxation.

1.flavor_text: Available for the exclusive use of Grand Luxxe guests, Spatium elevates the spa experience to luxurious new heights with a gorgeous indoor/outdoor facility and the latest relaxation techniques and treatments.

2.name: the wellness program
2.flavor_text: Wellness isn’t just a state of being: it’s a transformative journey. We’re excited to offer guests at Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta the opportunity to embrace this journey with The Wellness Program, a comprehensive curriculum meant to usher in utter comfort and balance for the mind, body, and spirit. The program offers two different curated paths toward wellbeing—The Spa, Fitness & Nutrition Program and the Joy Squad Activities Program. Contact your concierge if you’d like to experience The Wellness Program on your next visit to Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta.

text.description: Treatments at Spatium range from more traditional, holistic therapies, to one-of-a-kind themed spa journeys and treatment rituals, to breakthrough healing therapies incorporating indigenous ingredients.

0.flavor_text: Located in the lush jungle outside of Grand Luxxe Residence Tower, Spatium fuses ancient healing and beauty treatments with cutting-edge facilities to create a new, elevated experience in pampering. The environment seamlessly incorporates the innately relaxing effects of nature with its unique indoor and outdoor design, creating a haven of relaxation—also known as complete paradise!

1.flavor_text: Available for the exclusive use of Grand Luxxe guests, Spatium elevates the spa experience to luxurious new heights with a gorgeous indoor/outdoor facility and the latest relaxation techniques and treatments.

text.description: Brio offers a comprehensive menu of treatments that draws of a variety of techniques and reflects different philosophies from all over the world to provide healing and rejuvenating services.

0.flavor_text: Located in The Grand Mayan, Brio takes the classic French art of spa and reimagines it into a space filled with unique architectural elements, offering a wide variety of revitalizing and therapeutic treatments for the face, body, and soul. Spa facilities include outdoor relaxation palapas, Jacuzzis, and cold plunge tubs to be enjoyed before or after treatments.

1.tagline: The Healing Powers of the Temazcal
1.flavor_text: For those looking to embrace the cultural roots of Mexico in their wellness journey, Brio Nuevo Vallarta offers a truly singular experience: the purifying ritual of the Temazcal. According to traditional beliefs, this ancient sweat lodge allows one to remove impurities from their body and spirit during a Shaman-guided ritual. Contact Brio to schedule your Temazcal ritual.

text.description: As the evening settles in, that’s when Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta bursts to life. Intoxicating live music; vibrant displays of acrobatics, dance, clowning, and artistry; dazzling light shows utilizing the latest in digital effects; festive celebrations of food, culture, and fun—this is your vacation and this destination provides a myriad of ways to enrich and enliven every moment of it. It’s time to embrace the magic and marvels playing out all around you!

0.name: santuario
0.flavor_text: At the heart of Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta is Santuario, a sprawling 75,000-square-foot, indoor-outdoor entertainment pavilion. Santuario offers a nightly lineup of acts for the whole family, including acrobatics, dance performances, musical acts, sand artists, and more. It also features multiple bars, lounges, and lounge decks, perfect for kicking back and enjoying the evening.

1.name: lake-show
1.flavor_text: Add some dazzle to your stay at Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta by checking out The Lake Show. Every 30 minutes after sunset, the lake by La Cantina and Gong erupts in an amazing display of lights, fountains, special effects, and music. Plus, every show is different, so you can stop by night after night to enjoy the astounding sights.

2.name: theme-nights
2.flavor_text: Experience Mexican culture, performances by local dancers and singers, and film nights for the whole family with the weekly Theme Nights at The Grand Bliss beach at Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta. Theme Nights vary by season, but a typical weekly lineup includes the live performances and buffet of Monday Beach Party, Mexican food and mariachi of Sabores de México, and Family Movie Night.

3.flavor_text: Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta is proud to showcase the talents of some of Riviera Nayarit’s top musicians with live music throughout the resort. From jazz, to Cuban, to classical piano, to mariachi, you can find these acts performing at Santuario, Havana Moon, Azur, The Grand Lobby Bar, Luxxe Bar, and La Cantina. Ask your concierge for the schedule of live music during your stay.

4.flavor_text: The Holidays are better at Vidanta! We’re always eager to make your stay as special as possible for you and your family, and holidays are no exception. At Nuevo Vallarta, we’re proud to host special events, activities, and celebrations for the following holidays:

0.flavor_text: It’s your vacation, so why not spend it doing the types of things you love to do? At Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta, you’ll find a wide variety of activities, from sports tournaments and classes to arts and crafts or poolside trivia, all run by our amazing activities team, the Joy Squad.

1.flavor_text: Throughout the resort you might recognize the bright shirts and warm smiles of our Joy Squad. They’re here to make sure your vacation is filled with fun, excitement, and new experiences. Stop by any Activities Stand to say hello and see what great adventures are on the schedule for the day!

2.flavor_text: Become a tequila connoisseur and learn the finer points about Mexico’s national spirit in this fun outdoor tour offering a tequila tasting, cocktail lessons, and barbecue.

3.flavor_text: Kid’s Club is your vacation go-to for fun for the little ones! Located by The Grand Mayan wave pool, Kid’s Club offers an assortment of amazing activities, including water activities at the on-premise pool, for children ages 5 to 12. All of these activities are supervised by our expert staff. Kid’s Club also has weekly theme nights where, for an additional fee, you can drop off your children and enjoy an evening at the resort while they make new friends and try new things at events like Pirate Night or Pajama Party. There is also a Grand Luxxe-exclusive Kid’s Club located by Grand Luxxe Tower 4.

4.flavor_text: For those looking for additional adventures, there are a variety of on- and off-resort experiences offered by outside companies. On the beach, you can try your hand at kayaking, stand-up paddle boarding, or surfing. Or you can explore the scenery of the Riviera Nayarit region with off-site excursions like zip-lining in the jungle, whale watching, or deep-sea fishing. Simply visit the travel concierge in your resort hotel lobby to coordinate one of these exciting day trips.

0.flavor_text: See where Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta sources its produce straight from the vine! This 40-acre farm yields over 65 types of fruits and vegetables that are used throughout the resort!

1.flavor_text: This stunning new tower offers amazing views of the resort, Ameca River, Sierra Madres, and Banderas Bay from its brand-new rooftop restaurant

2.flavor_text: Become a tequila connoisseur and learn the finer points about Mexico’s national spirit in this fun outdoor tour offering a tequila tasting, cocktail lessons, and barbecue.
